meanings.definition: strange or eccentric in an amusing way
meanings.sent1: The clown's kookiest hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She wore the kookiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: His kookiest dance moves entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The kookiest idea popped into her head like a colorful balloon.
meanings.sent5: The kookiest character in the story was a talking squirrel.

meanings.definition: behaving in a strange or eccentric manner
meanings.sent1: The kookiest person at the event was the man juggling oranges.
meanings.sent2: She always has the kookiest way of greeting people.
meanings.sent3: The kookiest thing he did was wear mismatched socks to work.
meanings.sent4: Her kookiest habit was collecting rubber ducks.
meanings.sent5: The kookiest behavior at the zoo was the penguin doing somersaults.

meanings.sent1: The scientist had the kookiest theories about time travel.
meanings.sent2: He shared the kookiest solution to the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: Her kookiest suggestion was to use marshmallows as building blocks.
meanings.sent4: The kookiest concept in the book was a tree that grew candy.
meanings.sent5: The kookiest invention at the fair was a robot that told jokes.
